00022 #ifndef ACTION_DESCRIPTION_H
00023 #define ACTION_DESCRIPTION_H
00024 
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <vector>
00027 #include "FeatureOption.h"
00028 
00029 using std::string;
00030 using std::vector;
00031 
00033 typedef enum
00034 {
00035   ACTION_NONE,
00036   ACTION_FETCH,
00037   ACTION_UNPACK,
00038   ACTION_CONFIGURE,
00039   ACTION_BUILD,
00040   ACTION_INSTALL,
00041   ACTION_REINSTALL,
00042   ACTION_UPDATE,
00043   ACTION_UNINSTALL,
00044   ACTION_CLEAN,
00045   ACTION_FAIL
00046 } ActionType;
00047 
00049 class ActionDescription
00050 {
00051 public:
00052   ActionDescription();
00053   ~ActionDescription();
00054   string GetOldRevision();
00055   void SetOldRevision(string revision);
00056   string GetNewRevision();
00057   void SetNewRevision(string revision);
00058   string GetPackageName();
00059   void SetPackageName(string name);
00060   string GetError();
00061   void SetError(string errorMsg);
00062   ActionType GetAction();
00063   void SetAction(ActionType action);
00064   int GetNumFeatures() const;
00065   const FeatureOption* GetFeature(int featureNumber) const;
00066   void SetFeatures(const FeatureOptionVector& features);
00067   bool operator==(const ActionDescription& refAction) const;
00068 private:
00070   string mOldRevision;
00072   string mNewRevision;
00074   string mPackageName;
00076   string mErrorMessage;
00078   ActionType mAction;
00080   FeatureOptionVector mFeatures;
00081 };
00082 
00084 class ActionDescriptionVector : public vector<ActionDescription *>
00085 {
00086 public:
00087   void push_back(ActionDescription* element);
00088 };
